Am I eligible?

We'd like to ask a few quick questions to establish whether you're eligible for transferring your UK Pension to Australian Superannuation.

You're the right age to make a Pension transfer!

We're glad you're making a step in the right direction.

Whilst you're eligible it's important to understand if a transfer is appropriate for you. Our complimentary report will provide the answer.

Not ready just yet?

Speak to a specialist

Thank you!

You must be over 55 in order to be eligible to make a UK Pension transfer to an Australian Super Fund.

There is however a lot that can be done that can prepare you for this. What would you like to do?
